meanings.sent1: The unwont rain in the desert surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: It was unwont for him to arrive early to the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The penguin wearing a hat looked quite unwont.
meanings.sent4: Her unwont kindness warmed the hearts of all who met her.
meanings.sent5: The unwont sight of a shooting star left them in awe.

meanings.sent1: She felt unwont in the bustling city crowd.
meanings.sent2: The unwont silence in the house made him uneasy.
meanings.sent3: The cat's unwont fascination with water was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: His unwont fear of heights kept him from climbing the ladder.
meanings.sent5: The unwont taste of the exotic fruit lingered on his tongue.
